graphics.morseCode
Class MorseCodeBeeper

java.lang.Object
  




public class MorseCodeBeeper
extends Object

Author:
Erik Pasternak (epastern@andrew.cmu.edu) Created using work by Chris Bartley as a starting point. This module is designed to take input from the user either as dot '.', dash '-', space ' ' input that it will translate into text or a text string that it will translate into Morse Code. To use this program, place the Finch's tail on a soft object so it is slightly inclined. Then tap on the tail to enter morse code (as a telegraph operator used to enter the code).
